# docker_hub_repositories (Data Source)

Lists Docker Hub repositories for a namespace.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `namespace` (String) The Docker Hub namespace (username or organization name).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this data source.
- `repositories` (Attributes List) List of repositories in the namespace. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--repositories))

<a id="nestedatt--repositories"></a>
### Nested Schema for `repositories`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String) Short description.
- `full_description` (String) Full description.
- `id` (String) The repository ID.
- `name` (String) The repository name.
- `namespace` (String) The namespace.
- `private` (Boolean) Whether the repository is private.
- `pull_count` (Number) Number of pulls.
- `star_count` (Number) Number of stars.
